# Function concat

Concatenate two or more matrices
Usage:
    math.concat(A, B, C, ...)
    math.concat(A, B, C, ..., dim)

Where the optional dim is the zero-based number of the dimension to be
concatenated.


### Parameters

Parameter | Type | Description
--------- | ---- | -----------
`args` | ... Array &#124; Matrix | 

### Returns

Type | Description
---- | -----------
Array &#124; Matrix | res
